reviewText: This presentation is intriguing as all heck. You'll have to do your own homework on it to verify the speculations, but there is plausibility amidst the less than believable. Worth a look and good for brushing up on your math. Also, since it is amateurish, I expect you'll not find the likes of it anywhere else. It takes courage to go against the status quo of "known" knowledge. And the big money doesn't like to take chances: Universities and the science/business world will skirt this issue like the plague.
